a) impractical
b) unfair

It's not as simple as scoring a fight, for one thing someone would have to 
keep track of it and that person would have to be impartial.  No one here is 
impartial.

It's unfair because there's more to RP'ing than just fighting.  In fact one 
of the biggest complaints before the restart was that there were too many 
pointless battles.  To make it all about fighting would be a mistake.

Now if you want to fix these problems and resubmit your idea to the council, 
I suggest you send it to the council.  Your idea has merit and might work if 
you can fix the flaws.

--part1_12.1e049b01.29f453c3_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
